Horace Chin Wan-kan, born 8 November 1961), better known by his pen name Chin Wan, is a Hong Kong scholar advocating localism, best known for his publications On the Hong Kong City-State series. Wikipedia
Born: November 8, 1961 (age 60 years), Hong Kong
